title: Tabakuro Lake
about: Lake Tabakuro is located in the Imereti region, in the municipality of Vani, near the village of Zeda Gora, 230 meters above sea level. The lake is very beautiful, both in spring greenery and in autumn. The environment hidden in the trees and the blue sky reflected in the water create a pleasant place for nature lovers. The road goes very close to Lake Tabakuro.
